name: Car Parking Puzzle 2
description:
Car Parking Puzzle
is most popular and addictive sliding block puzzle game.

The goal of this game is to solve the traffic jam in the car parking by moving the red car out of the chaos.
HOW TO PLAY
• Need to move the yellow car to the exit.
• Horizontal cars can be moved from side to side
• Vertical cars can be moved up and down
• use HINT, solve puzzle.
